title: My Google - Pixel 3a XL with 64GB Memory Cell Phone (Unlocked) USA- is LOCKED to use it in Colombia
content:
On NOV 29-2019, I bought in Amazon.com my Google - Pixel 3a XL with 64GB Memory Cell Phone (Unlocked), however, it is LOCKED to be used in Colombia.

It was never advertised as it was only unlocked to be used in the USA,  now, I am in COLOMBIA, but my phone is not internationally Unlocked.

This is very frustrating and annoying.

Please help me to UNLOCK my phone so I can keep using it in my Country COLOMBIA, South America.
